group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:4056_landing_jump2]Hyaaagh!
Yuck. These Familiars are, like, in a whole@different dimension compared to regular ones!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, but you're keeping up with them just@fine. You're doing great.

group_1.textRight: That means a bunch coming from you,@Myako-senpai!
I don't really get it, but these Familiars @keep moving forward in a straight line.
It's super easy to just shoot them down, @you know?

group_1.textLeft: They may be advancing without regard for@their safety, like a bullet from a gun.
How're things going with you guys?

group_1.textRight: We outlasted the first wave of attacks.

group_1.textLeft: As you and Emily said, our enemies appear@quite reckless.
If we keep our calm and don't let them get@the best of us, we stand a good chance.

group_1.textRight: In other words...
If we protect this bay area, it'll be like @an iron gate for Fort Kamihama!
We might actually be able to fight @Walpurgisnacht on an even footing that way!

group_1.textLeft: Optimistic as ever, I see.
The only reason we're able to fight them off@here is because we're in a group.
Indeed. The bay area is rather vast...
We will have no choice but to divide our@forces if enemies appear elsewhere.

group_1.textRight: Ngh, that's...a good point...
Oh my god, guys, look at THAT!

group_1.textLeft: Familiars! Looks like they're coming from @where Eve is.
They're scattering throughout Kamihama...

group_1.textRight: On your guard, everyone! Another wave is@incoming!
What?
They're appearing in other places...not just@here?

group_1.textLeft: This is rapidly turning into a nightmare.

group_1.textRight: Nanaka!
Walpurgisnacht's Familiars are showing up@all over the city!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'm aware.

group_1.textRight: It's almost like they're responding to the @Familiars Eve scattered everywhere.
I really was being way too optimistic...
It's only a matter of time before the city@is completely overrun with Familiars!
Whadda we DO, Myako-senpai?!
You are the most experienced Magical Girl@among us, Hinano.
We have no time for debate. Tell us what to@do, and we will do it.
I have no objections to that.

group_1.textLeft: One option is to stay here and wait for@Walpurgisnacht to come to us.
But honestly, if the Familiars keep on@coming, they'll be just as much of a threat.
And worst-case scenario, they might even@turn into Witches themselves...

group_1.textRight: So then...

group_1.textLeft: Desperate times, desperate measures.
Everyone, split into teams and spread out!
We're tackling the Familiars!
If the Magical Girls by Eve can take it out,@that'll get rid of half of the Familiars.
Do your best to hold out 'til then!

group_1.textCenter: What in the world happened here...?
I'm certain Fendt Hope used to be just over @there.
Does that mean that massive thing lying@down in the distance is Eve...?

group_1.textRight: Mitama! Can you hear me?

group_1.textLeft: Tsukasa?
Are you close by? Are Momoko and the others@with you?

group_1.textRight: No, we split up.
We're using our special power to force our@telepathic message through to you.

group_1.textLeft: I see.
Do you know what's happening right now?
It looks like Eve's restraints were cut.

group_1.textRight: What?!
They were still holding strong when we left!
There was a huge earthquake, though...
Maybe Eve broke free then.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Also, we have more important matters to @attend to.

group_1.textLeft: The situation is bad enough as it is...

group_1.textRight: Yes, but this is another issue altogether.
Mifuyu cast an illusion on herself...
...so that she could destroy Fendt Hope.

group_1.textLeft: She did what? She used her forbidden magic?!

group_1.textRight: Yes... But she's still breathing.

group_1.textLeft: Where are you now?

group_1.textRight: We are about to arrive at your shop.

group_1.textLeft: Very well.
I'll be right with you. There's just one@thing I need to take care of first.
Wait inside the shop for me.

group_1.textCenter: First, I need to let Iroha and her friends@know what happened.

group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Pant*
Please hang in there, Mifuyu...

group_1.textLeft: Is there nothing we can do to help her?
We were Feathers, after all. There must be@something we can do.
I know they were hiding the truth, but I@can't believe this was what awaited us.
I feel so helpless...
